definition: investing with borrowed money as a way to amplify potential gains (at the risk of greater losses), provide with leverage
details:
noun
- investing with borrowed money as a way to amplify potential gains (at the risk of greater losses)
= synonyms: leveraging
- strategic advantage
- the mechanical advantage gained by being in a position to use a lever
= synonyms: purchase
verb
- provide with leverage
= example: provide with leverage
- supplement with leverage
= example: supplement with leverage
